articles.title: Tokyo Olympics: Shot putter Tom Walsh snares bronze behind power house Americans - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Tom Walsh and Americans Ryan Crouser and Joe Kovacs all walked away with the same coloured medals as they did in Rio in 2016.
articles.content:
Shot putter Tom Walsh has added a bronze medal to New Zealands Olympic tally.
 The 29-year-old Rio bronze medallist finished third behind man mountain Ryan Crouser, who unleashed an Olympic record 2… [+3874 chars]

articles.title: American Ryan Crouser breaks his Olympic record, wins gold in shot put at Tokyo Games - ESPN
articles.description: Ryan Crouser broke his Olympic record on his way to defending his shot put title at the Tokyo Olympics on Thursday.
articles.content:
TOKYO -- Ryan Crouser broke his own Olympic record on his way to defending his shot put title Thursday on a hot day in Tokyo.
On his last attempt, Crouser went 23.30 meters (76 feet, 5½ inches) to e… [+1039 chars]

articles.author: Tom Schad, USA TODAY
articles.title: US men's 4x100 relay shockingly fails to qualify for final at Tokyo Olympics - USA TODAY
articles.description: Team USA has a history of relay mishaps, from lane violations to poor handoffs. Thursday was no different as the Americans were sixth in their heat.
articles.content:
TOKYO – Team USA arrived in Tokyo with three of the fastest 100-meter sprinters in the world this year, making it the heavy favorite to win the men's 4x100 relay.
Instead, the Americans failed to so… [+2036 chars]

articles.title: 'Ample chance' for more dangerous COVID variant if more Americans aren't vaccinated, Fauci says - KABC-TV
articles.description: If more Americans don't get vaccinated against COVID-19, there is "ample chance" of another coronavirus variant emerging, Dr. Fauci warned Wednesday.

articles.title: Irish-American woman in prime position to be governor of New York - The Irish Times
articles.description: Kathy Hochul will replace Andrew Cuomo if he quits or is impeached in harassment scandal
articles.content:
